author: Dan Cancian
title: Kevin Durant Warns Rihanna About Coronavirus After Pop Star Jokes About Wearing a Mask
description: The two-time NBA champion is one of four Brooklyn Nets players to have tested positive for coronavirus.
content: Throughout his career, Kevin Durant has established himself as a bonafide NBA great, courtesy of two NBA titles and two NBA Finals MVP awards. As Rihanna found out for herself over the weekend, the second overall pick of the 2007 NBA draft is also world-class… [+2638 chars]
